questions.question: Under which conditions is it appropriate to store work-related information on your mobile device?

choices.answer: Formal approval and a secure configuration
Strong encryption and an urgent need for access
Working remotely with real-time malware scanning
nothing to worry to store work-related information on your mobile device

questions.question: Why is it important to disable Wi-Fi and Bluetooth when you are not using them?

choices.answer: Mobile devices allow anyone on a wireless network access to its encryption
Mobile devices can automatically connect to dangerous wireless networks
Mobile devices don't use encryption for wireless communications
It is FREE so we should not disable it

questions.question: Why is it important to update your mobile device to have the latest versions of its operating system and applications?

choices.answer: provides access to new security features and fixes for known vulnerability
It protects against phishing attacks and social engineering.
prevent unauthorized or harmful applications from being installed on device

questions.question: When downloading a new app, which criterion should you look for to keep your mobile device secure?

choices.answer: An app that is the lowest cost compared to the other mobile apps
An app that uses a secret encryption algorithm written by the developer
An app that is actively updated and maintained by the developer
An app that is the highest cost compared to the other mobile apps

questions.question: Why is it important to secure your mobile device with a screen lock?

choices.answer: To protect the information on your mobile device if it is lost or stolen
To protect the screen from becoming damaged if the device is dropped
To protect confidential info from being read over the user's shoulder
to save power so it can last longer
